item.title: gitflow for measured.
item.description: Had a good chat to the ever helpful Miles about git yesterday. A good follow-up from the unconf where I cornered Jenny and pestered her with questions. I think Iâ€™m starting to understand things a bit better. Anyway, no better place to try things out than the blog, which I assume no one reads :) create branch git checkout <branch-name>^1 make changes commit git commit -m "<some-message>" push git push merge by pull request on github So, how to integrate this with a blogging workflow.
